name: Nicolucci v. Pittsburgh National Bank, Appellant

judges: Before Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, .JJ.
parties: Nicolucci v. Pittsburgh National Bank, Appellant.
attorneys: Myron W. Lampropios, with him George W. Lamproplos, and Cassidy & Lamproplos, for appellant.
Robert J. Key, with him Philip Corbin, Jr., and Rubin and Balter, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Nicolucci v. Pittsburgh National Bank, Appellant.
Argued March 17, 1966.
Before Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, .JJ.
April 19, 1966:
Myron W. Lampropios, with him George W. Lamproplos, and Cassidy & Lamproplos, for appellant.
Robert J. Key, with him Philip Corbin, Jr., and Rubin and Balter, for appellee.
